title: Prom Night Dress Up
description: Prom Night Dress Up is a beauty game where you can experience the excitement of prom night with 6 stylish girl friends competing for the title of prom queen! Show off your fashion prowess in this makeover and dress-up game for girls, featuring over 200 trendy clothing items. Dress the girls in the best dresses and fancy accessories, from hats to shoes and handbags. Capture the prom princesses' stunning looks with photos to share with friends. Get ready to make prom night unforgettable!
